SEARCH
Package fr.avenirsesr.portfolio.security.service

Class AccessControlService

java.lang.Object
fr.avenirsesr.portfolio.security.service.AccessControlService
@Service public class AccessControlService extends Object

AccessControlService

Description: AccessControlService is used to check if a resource can be accessed by a principal. It is an RBAC: Role Based Access Control.

Version:

1.0

Author:

Arnaud Deman

Since:

04/10/2024

    • grantAccess

      public AccessControlGrantResponse grantAccess(AccessControlGrantRequest grantRequest)
      Grant access.
      Parameters:
      grantRequest - The request with the information on the access to grant.
      Returns:
      An AccessControlResponse.

    • revokeAccess

      public AccessControlRevokeResponse revokeAccess(AccessControlRevokeRequest revokeRequest)
      Revokes access by deleting the underlying assignment.
      Parameters:
      revokeRequest - The information to determine the assignment to delete.
      Returns:
      The response with the result of the operation.

    • isAuthorized

      public boolean isAuthorized(Principal principal, RBACAction action, RBACResource resource)
      Checks that a principal has access to a resource to perform an action, without application context.
      Parameters:
      principal - The principal.
      action - The action to perform.
      resource - The accessed resource.
      Returns:
      True if the principal has access to the resource.

    • isAuthorized

      public boolean isAuthorized(String login, UUID actionId, UUID resourceId)
      Checks that a principal has access to a resource to perform an action, without application context.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the principal.
      actionId - The id of the action to perform.
      resourceId - The id of the accessed resource.
      Returns:
      True if the principal has access to the resource.

    • createExecutionContext

      public RBACContext createExecutionContext(Principal principal)
      Creates an execution context.
      Parameters:
      principal - The Principal associated to the execution context.
      Returns:
      The execution context.
